tool_description: Fetches real-time shipping rates from multiple carriers based on package specifications and service requirements.

carrier_codes.description: List of carriers to get quotes from

service_types.description: Requested service types (standard, expedited, overnight, ground)

declared_value.description: Declared value of package contents in USD

residential_delivery.description: Whether delivery is to residential address

error_messages: API connection failed: Unable to connect to carrier rate API
Invalid package specifications: Ensure all dimensions and weight are positive values
Service type not available: Requested service type not supported by carrier
Rate quote timeout: Carrier API did not respond within time limit
Invalid ZIP codes: Origin or destination ZIP code format is incorrect
usage: Provide carrier_codes, origin/destination ZIPs, package specifications, and optionally service_types, declared_value, and residential_delivery to get rate quotes.

rate_quotes.description: Array of rate quote details including carrier, service, cost, and transit time
